mapper.select: select id as id, resource_name as resourceName, node_info as nodeInfo, `count` as `count`, des as des, update_time as updateTime, create_time as createTime from unionkeylock where resource_name = #{resourceName}
mapper.insert: insert into unionkeylock ( resource_name, node_info, `count`, des, update_time, create_time ) values ( #{info.resourceName}, #{info.nodeInfo}, 1, #{info.des}, now(), now() )
